General.Name: Shinil Electronics Co
General.Description: Shinil Electronics Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells household appliances in South Korea. It offers summer appliances, such as fans, air circulators, mobile air conditioners, etc.; and winter appliances, including fan heaters, ultra-low power heaters, hand-wash humidifiers, etc.; and household, kitchen, environmental, and pet household appliances. The company was formerly known as Shinil Industrial Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shinil Electronics Co.,Ltd in April 2020. Shinil Electronics Co.,Ltd was founded in 1959 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
